mapper.insert: insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC (ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, ISSEND, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, PEOPLECASEID, SFCNUMBER, ARCHIVETYPE, ARCHIVENAME,BASERECORDID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issend,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peoplecaseid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{caseinfoid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{baserecordid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

select SEQ_FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC_ID.nextval from dual
insert into FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC
ID, SCBJ, STATE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, JQBH, AJBH, PEOPLECASEID, AUTHOR, AUTHORIDCARD, caseinfoid, BASERECORDID,
ISSEND,
SFCNUMBER,
ARCHIVETYPE,

update FUN_ARCHIVE_SFC
SCBJ = #{scbj,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UPDATETIME = sysdate,
JQBH = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AJBH = #{ajbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

AUTHOR = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIDCARD = #{authoridcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PEOPLECASEID = #{peoplecaseid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SFCNUMBER = #{sfcnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ARCHIVETYPE = #{archivetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ARCHIVENAME = #{archivename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
